attributes.background: Tony Foulds has shown true dedication in tending the memorial of ten US Airmen who showed extraordinary courage to avoid hurting children when their aircraft crashed in North West England. He has behaved honourably in keeping the memory alive of servicemen who gave their lives  so he could live his

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
